rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with a decorative archway that aligns with Vastu principles.
An open-plan living room integrated with the kitchen for Bohemian aesthetics and communal feel.
Open-plan kitchen designed with modern appliances and natural ventilation, following local building norms.
A dining area adjacent to the living room for informal family meals.
First master bedroom with ample natural light and a private balcony, oriented towards auspicious directions per Vastu guidelines.
Ensuite bathroom for the master bedroom ensuring privacy and effective drainage.

openings.description: Main entrance door positioned to maximize positive energy flow.
Large windows in the living room for natural light and ventilation.
Window to ensure proper kitchen ventilation adhering to local norms.

rooms.description: Second bedroom with a balcony that aligns with Vastu principles for optimal rest and energy.
A dedicated study room designed to foster creativity and productivity.

openings.description: Split-level staircase connecting the ground and upper floors, designed for ease of access.
Balcony door to provide an outdoor extension from the bedroom.

vastu_considerations.energy_flow: Ensuring ample natural light and ventilation across all rooms.
vastu_considerations.material_choices: Use locally sourced materials that resonate with Bohemian aesthetics while adhering to Vastu principles.

local_building_norms.plot_size_utilization: 40x60 feet plot optimally used with minimal external walls and maximized open spaces.
local_building_norms.compliance: All dimensions and room placements are in accordance with local building regulations and safety codes.
